Home.heading: Freedom for all your money
Home.subHeader: Sign Up to Seamlessly Manage All Your Assets in One Place, Simply and Freely.

ProductFeatures.title: All Freedom to Spend
ProductFeatures.description: Spend Anywhere, Any Way, on Anything, with Any Financial Asset

Payments.title: Simplify All Your Payments
Payments.description: Pay Here Instantly - No Registration Needed, In- App or on the Website, It's Always Easy.

AllMoneyCard.title: All money card
AllMoneyCard.secondaryDescription: Revolutionary card that allows you spend digital and traditional money. Browse our benefits to choose the subscription that fits your spending needs and digital card design that expresses you

AppAdvertisement.title: One app for all your money management needs
AppAdvertisement.description: A Simple and Easy App for Managing, Spending, and Saving all Your Money

DownloadApp.title: Scan to Explore New Financial Possibilities
DownloadApp.description: Ready to embark on a journey towards endless possibilities? Scan to download Emoney and discover a revolutionary approach to managing your finances.

EasySend.title: Sending ALL Money Just Got Easy
EasySend.description: Send all kinds of money to Emoney users with few clicks, anywhere around the globe; we guarantee they will get it in seconds

AnywhereAnytime.title: Anywhere, anytime. effortless methods for moving money
AnywhereAnytime.bankTransferDesc: Send money to any local bank account, and it will clear within minutes. Say goodbye to waiting for funds to transfer between different banks.
AnywhereAnytime.linkedCardsDesc: Send or receive money using not only Emoney balance, but other bank cards with our easy and friendly money transfer services.
AnywhereAnytime.phoneNumberDesc: Send and receive money using phone numbers at lightning speed. It's not only fast and dependable but also completely free of charge.
